Translations.Text: A Yeeya, eiief Tazmamt, s loehd". D uuebyan, Nefka yas uuwab
ibedd i imawlan is; ur illi d aqehhao ne$ d amaaui
Tifrat fellas asmi d ilul, asmi ara immet, asmi ara d iu$al d amuddir
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Meryem, asmi taazel iman is, si twacult is, di tama ugmuv
Terra ssteo garas yidsen. Nuzen as d ooue nne£. £uoes, amzun d amdan ifuqen
Tenna: "ad iyi Eerz Uenin, segk, ma tepeezzibev
Inna: "nek, d amersul kan n Mass im, ad am fke$ aqcic iufan
Tenna: "amek ara sau$ aqcic, ur iyi innul umdan, ur lli$ d tazennant
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass im: ayagi, ishel fellI. A t Nerr d assekni i medden, d aeunu s$uone£. D lameo ippueeppmen
Tebbwi tadist; syis taazel iman is, di tama ibaaden
Bdan p id inzikmiren ar loedra n tezdayt. Tenna: "anna$ lemmer mmute$, uqbel ayagi, ad pwappu$ akw
Issawel as d, seddaw as: "kkes a$wbel, ih, Mass im Irra i$eeo, seddaw am
Hucc, ar $uoem, loedra n tezdayt, ad am d i$li ppmeo amaynut ibwan
